item.title: PNC Bank Partners with Coinbase to Launch Customer Crypto Trading ServicesAccording to Reuters, PNC Bank, the eighth-largest bank in the U.S., is partnering with Coinbase to roll out cryptocurrency trading services for its customers. PNC will leverage Coinbase's institutional-grade "crypto-as-a-service" platform to enable customers to buy, sell, and hold crypto assets, and will provide some banking services to Coinbase. [Reuters]

item.title: Tron Inc. to Ring the Nasdaq Opening Bell on July 24Tron Inc. (Nasdaq: TRON) has announced that it will hold an opening bell ceremony at the Nasdaq MarketSite in Times Square, New York on July 24th, US Eastern Time, hosted by Justin Sun, founder of TRON and Global Advisor of Tron Inc. This marks the company's official transformation into a technology company focused on blockchain and digital asset innovation. The company stated that the bell-ringing is not only an important milestone in the development of Tron Inc., but also highlights its long-term vision of driving shareholder value growth through innovation and strategic leadership. Formerly known as SRM Entertainment, the company is currently the listed company holding the most TRON (TRX) tokens. [Odaily News]

item.title: Coinbase to List JITOSOL and MPLXCoinbase has announced the listing of Jito Staked SOL (JITOSOL) and Metaplex (MPLX) on the Solana network, with plans to enable JITOSOL/USD and MPLX/USD trading pairs in phases starting July 24, 2025, at 9:00 AM (PT), pending liquidity conditions. The official reminder is not to send assets through other networks to prevent fund loss. [Odaily News]
item.description: 50 minutes agoOdailyCoinbase to List JITOSOL and MPLXCoinbase has announced the listing of Jito Staked SOL (JITOSOL) and Metaplex (MPLX) on the Solana network, with plans to enable JITOSOL/USD and MPLX/USD trading pairs in phases starting July 24, 2025, at 9:00 AM (PT), pending liquidity conditions.

item.title: The US government's AI.Gov official website is officially launched, focusing on Trump's AI strategyOn July 23, the US government launched a new AI.Gov official website today, systematically launching the "American AI Action Plan", proposing three pillar strategies of "accelerating innovation, building AI infrastructure, and leading international AI diplomacy and security". The plan was led by President Donald Trump in the early days of his second term, emphasizing the improvement of national AI competitiveness by reducing regulation, supporting open source AI, strengthening infrastructure and international cooperation, and promoting the application of AI in key areas such as medicine, manufacturing, and national defense, in order to consolidate the United States' global AI leadership. [PANews]

item.title: In the past 24 hours, the entire network liquidation was $501.00M, mainly liquidating long positions.On July 23, according to Coinglass data, the total liquidation amount in the cryptocurrency market in the past 24 hours reached $501.00 million, of which $384.00 million were long liquidations and $117.00 million were short liquidations. The liquidation amount of ETH reached $107.00 million, BTC liquidated $50.61 million, and XRP liquidated $49.20 million. In the past 24 hours, 176,047 people were liquidated, and the largest single liquidation occurred on Binance's ETH-USDT trading pair, worth $3.97 million. [Techflow]

item.title: BitMine Launches BMNR Options Trading on NYSE, Plans to Acquire 5% of Ethereum SupplyAccording to The Block, BitMine, an Ethereum vault and crypto mining company backed by Peter Thiel and ARK, launched options trading for its common stock BMNR on the New York Stock Exchange on Wednesday. BitMine plans to acquire 5% of the global Ethereum (ETH) supply. The company's stock price has risen sharply since announcing its shift to ETH accumulation, with Founders Fund now being the largest shareholder, and ARK Invest also purchasing $182.00M worth of shares this week to invest in ETH. As of July 17, the total value of ETH held by BitMine has exceeded $1.00B. [Foresight News]

item.title: Spark launches SPK farm and other new features to optimize user revenue experienceOn July 23, the Spark platform recently launched a number of practical functions, including SPK farm (supply USDS to earn SPK), Overdrive (increase airdrop rewards), USDS (SPK farm) pool (stake SPK to enjoy SPK annualized income), and earning USDS points through Pendle. Users can increase their income by providing USDS, staking SPK, or participating in Overdrive activities, with no lock-up period and no additional threshold, further enriching the way to participate in DeFi. [PANews]

item.title: Justin Sun May Be the Cause of Most Ethereum Withdrawal EventsOver the past week, people have withdrawn as much as $1.7 billion worth of Ethereum from the lending protocol Aave. The reduction in available liquidity has caused the protocol to charge borrowers interest rates exceeding 10%. Aave contributor Marc Zeller told DL News that Justin Sun may be the cause of most of the Ethereum withdrawals, as he regularly moves large sums of money in and out of the lending protocol, "He's so unpredictable, he moves billions of dollars like I go to the supermarket to buy something." Over the past three days, wallets on Arkham that users have tagged as belonging to Justin Sun have withdrawn over $646.00 million worth of Ethereum from Aave. [DLNEWS]
item.description: 1 hour ago吴说Justin Sun May Be the Cause of Most Ethereum Withdrawal EventsOver the past week, people have withdrawn as much as $1.7 billion worth of Ethereum from the lending protocol Aave. The reduction in available liquidity has caused the protocol to charge borrowers interest rates exceeding 10%.

item.title: The Ethereum Foundation transferred 1,000 ETH to its internal addressOn July 23, Arkham data showed that 4 hours ago, the Ethereum Foundation transferred 1,000 ETH (about $3.67M) to its internal address. The address currently holds 10,000 ETH, worth about $36.1M. [PANews]

item.title: 21Shares Signs ETP Market Making Fund Platform Agreement with Société GénéraleCryptocurrency ETP issuer 21Shares has signed an ETP market-making fund platform agreement with Société Générale, which will support 21Shares' Bitcoin and Ethereum ETPs, including: ABTC, CBTC, AETH, CETH, by providing over-the-counter liquidity through major fund platforms in Germany and Eastern Europe. (Globe Newswire) [Odaily Planet Daily News]

item.title: H100 Group Increases Holdings by 117.93 BTC, Total Holdings Reach 628.22 BTCSwedish health tech company H100 Group announced the additional purchase of 117.93 Bitcoins, with an average purchase price of approximately 1,120,973.00 Swedish krona/Bitcoin, for a total amount of approximately 132.00 million Swedish krona (approximately $13.87 million). This increase is part of its Bitcoin treasury strategy, with some funds coming from the company's convertible bond agreement. H100 currently has a total holding of 628.22 BTC. [Wu Blockchain]

item.title: GitHub calls for European sovereign tech fund to support open source softwareOn July 23, according to the GitHub blog, open source software as digital infrastructure is vital to the economy and society, but its maintenance funds have long been insufficient. The GitHub Developer Policy Team commissioned Open Forum Europe, Fraunhofer ISI, and the European University Institute to conduct a feasibility study to explore the extension of the successful experience of Germany's sovereign technology institutions to the EU level and promote the establishment of the "EU Sovereign Technology Fund" (EU-STF). The study recommends that the fund should focus on investing in open source dependency, maintenance, security, improvement, and ecosystem construction, and proposes seven design standards, including funding pools, low bureaucracy, political independence, flexible funding, community participation, strategic alignment, and high transparency. GitHub calls on the EU to invest at least 350.00 million euros in the 2028-2035 budget, and to jointly fund with industry and countries to ensure the sustainable development and digital sovereignty of open source software. [PANews]
